title: Pesto, sun-dried tomato and cream cheese spread
ingredients: ['225g unsalted butter', '350g feta cheese, crumbled', '225g cream cheese, softened', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 shallot, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons dry vermouth', 'ground white pepper, to taste', '70g pine nuts, toasted', '55g sun-dried tomatoes, chopped', '175g pesto']
